text: Alexander Anthony Keith Bain (born 25 November 2001) is an English actor. He is known for playing Simon Barlow in the long-running ITV soap opera Coronation Street, a role he has played since 2008. He was born in Blackburn, Lancashire, England. == Other websites == * Category:2001 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from Lancashire
title: Alex Bain (actor)
